original: gal te de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyi chos can la gzhan gyi gtan tshigs grub par 'gyur ba de lta na yang sgrub par byed pa brjod pa don med pa can du 'gyur ro //🔽mi rtag pa can nyid kyis zhes bya ba la @274a * //
analyzed: gal te de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyi chos can la gzhan gyi gtan tshigs grub par 'gyur ba de lta na yang sgrub par byed pa brjod pa don med pa can du 'gyur ro // mi rtag pa can nyid kyis zhes bya ba la @274a * //
translated: If the reason of the other is established with regard to a subject having such an aspect, then the statement of the proof is pointless.

original: sogs pas dpe'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: sogs pas dpe'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po bstan pa yin te /
translated: The example is indicated by the words “because of impermanence,” etc.

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad par du byas pa'i chos can dang dpe chos mthun pa nyid gzhan la ma grub pa yin no //🔽bsgrub par bya ba'i sgras bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba ni dpe'i mtshan nyid la chos kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i sgrar bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad par du byas pa'i chos can dang dpe chos mthun pa nyid gzhan la ma grub pa yin no // bsgrub par bya ba'i sgras bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba ni dpe'i mtshan nyid la chos kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i sgrar bshad pa yin no //
translated: The example is similar to the subject, qualified by impermanence, but is not established for the other.🔽The word “probandum” is explained in the definition of the example.

original: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ni phyogs kyi sgrar bshad pa yin no zhes blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ni phyogs kyi sgrar bshad pa yin no zhes blta bar bya'o //
translated: The word “subject” in the definition of the reason should be understood as explained.

original: tshig smos pa nyid yin pa zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi tshig nyid yin te /
analyzed: tshig smos pa nyid yin pa zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi tshig nyid yin te /
translated: The word “only” means the word “subject” only.

original: shes bar 'dod pa'i bye brag can nyid kyi chos can phyogs kyi phyogs gcig tu rung ba khyab pa med pa dang khyab ches pa spangs nas phyogs kyi mtshan nyid byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro ;
analyzed: shes bar 'dod pa'i bye brag can nyid kyi chos can phyogs kyi phyogs gcig tu rung ba khyab pa med pa dang khyab ches pa spangs nas phyogs kyi mtshan nyid byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro ;
translated: Because the definition of a position is that which is suitable as one part of the position of the subject that is a specific instance of what is desired to be known, and which is free from the faults of overpervasion and underpervasion.

original: / phyogs kyi phyogs gcig tu rung ba de'i chos can gzung ba na phyogs kyi chos nye bar btags pas gzung btsugs pa nyid yin gyi bsgrub par bya ba'i sgra ni ma yin te /
analyzed: / phyogs kyi phyogs gcig tu rung ba de'i chos can gzung ba na phyogs kyi chos nye bar btags pas gzung btsugs pa nyid yin gyi bsgrub par bya ba'i sgra ni ma yin te /
translated: When one takes hold of the subject that is suitable as one part of the position, one takes hold of the superimposition of the property of the position, but not the term of the probandum.

original: de la ma grub yang dper thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la ma grub yang dper thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if it were, it would follow that the example would not be established.

original: bsgrub par bya ba yang gzhan gyis dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid du brjod pa de bas na gzhan gyi phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la chos can rtogs pa'i phyir tshig brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba yang gzhan gyis dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid du brjod pa de bas na gzhan gyi phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la chos can rtogs pa'i phyir tshig brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: And the probandum is also stated to be the definition of the thesis of another. Therefore, the expression of the term is not for the sake of understanding the subject in one part of the position of another.

original: sngar nges par gzung ba'am zhes bya ba ni tshig snga ma la nges par gzung ba ni kho na ste //
analyzed: sngar nges par gzung ba'am zhes bya ba ni tshig snga ma la nges par gzung ba ni kho na ste //
translated: As for previously ascertained, the term only in the previous sentence is elided.

original: nges par gzung ba'i 'bras bu can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par gzung ba'i 'bras bu can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the result of a definite assertion.

original: 'dir dam bca' ba nges par gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dir dam bca' ba nges par gzung ba yin no //
translated: Here, the thesis is the definite assertion.

original: de bzhin du phyis nges par gzung ba zhes bya ba 'di la yang blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du phyis nges par gzung ba zhes bya ba 'di la yang blta bar bya ste /
translated: Similarly, later on, in the phrase “definite assertion,” this should be understood.

original: 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba 'chad pa nges par gzung bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba 'chad pa nges par gzung bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Here, the thesis is the definite assertion of the explanation of the probandum.

original: sngar nges par gzung ba'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: sngar nges par gzung ba'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The result of a definite assertion is of two kinds:

original: bsgrub par bya ba 'chad pa nyid dam bca' ba yin gyi grub pa 'chad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba 'chad pa nyid dam bca' ba yin gyi grub pa 'chad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: the explanation of the probandum is the thesis, not the explanation of the established.

original: de la re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pas 'bras bu dang po zlog par byed do //
analyzed: de la re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pas 'bras bu dang po zlog par byed do //
translated: In this regard, the first result is refuted by the words “in this case,” etc.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnyis pa yin no //
translated: The second is refuted by the words “nor is it the case,” etc.

original: mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba bshad pa dam bca' ba nyid dam bca' ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'o //
analyzed: mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba bshad pa dam bca' ba nyid dam bca' ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'o //
translated: The result of the exclusion of non-possession is the explanation of the probandum. The thesis is not the explanation of the probandum. The exclusion of non-possession is the thesis.

original: de bas na dam bca' ba nges pa med pa nyid kyi phyir thal ches par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na dam bca' ba nges pa med pa nyid kyi phyir thal ches par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to demonstrate that the consequence is excessive because the thesis is not ascertained,

original: gtan tshigs dang dpe ma grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang dpe ma grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: he says, “The reason and example are not established,” and so on.

original: rigs pa bas dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa'i gzhung gang yin pa slob dpon gyis dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dag gi 'gal ba @274b ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar 'god par mdzad
analyzed: rigs pa bas dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa'i gzhung gang yin pa slob dpon gyis dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dag gi 'gal ba @274b ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar 'god par mdzad
translated: The master Bhāviveka states that the reason and example are contradictory in the passage that begins, “The reason and example are contradictory,” and so on.

original: do // bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su 'dod pa dang lhan cig med pa can ni zhes bya ba ni chos can gang la bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa'i chos de la med pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang lhan cig med pa can yin no zhes blta bar
analyzed: do // bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su 'dod pa dang lhan cig med pa can ni zhes bya ba ni chos can gang la bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa'i chos de la med pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang lhan cig med pa can yin no zhes blta bar
translated: The phrase “that which is asserted to be the predicate of the probandum” means that because the property of the subject is not present in the subject, it is “that which is not present in that which is asserted to be the predicate of the probandum.”🔽This should be seen as follows.

original: bya'o // de nyid kyi phyir 'di ltar /
analyzed: bya'o // de nyid kyi phyir 'di ltar /
translated: Therefore, it is like this:

original: 'dod dang med can ma grub yin //
analyzed: 'dod dang med can ma grub yin //
translated: The assertion and the absence are not established.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is what is meant by the phrase,

original: gang gi tshe chos can yod pa nyid la 'dod pa'i chos tsam dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos can yod pa nyid la 'dod pa'i chos tsam dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: “When the property-possessor exists, the mere property that is asserted is contradictory.

original: sgra mi rtag ces bya bar dam bca' ba la byas pa bzhin zhes bya ba yin pa de'i tshe gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ces bya bar dam bca' ba la byas pa bzhin zhes bya ba yin pa de'i tshe gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When the mere property is contradictory, the reason is contradictory, like the thesis ‘Sound is impermanent.’

original: de'i tshe yang phyogs kyi skyon ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang phyogs kyi skyon ma yin no //
translated: ” At that time, the fault of the position does not exist.

original: gal te mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyis zhes bya ba ni thams cad mi rtag ces bya ba la sogs pa 'dis so //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyis zhes bya ba ni thams cad mi rtag ces bya ba la sogs pa 'dis so //
translated: “If the reason ‘impermanence’ ” refers to “all is impermanent” and so on.

original: 'gal ba'i chos rtag pa nyid bshad pas zhes bya ba ni sgra rtag ces bya ba'i dam bca' ba 'dis so //🔽spyi ni rjes su 'jug yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i chos rtag pa nyid bshad pas zhes bya ba ni sgra rtag ces bya ba'i dam bca' ba 'dis so // spyi ni rjes su 'jug yin no //
translated: “The explanation of the contradictory property permanence” refers to the thesis “Sound is permanent.”

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis brjod pa dngos po tsam mi rtag pa nyid du rjes su 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis brjod pa dngos po tsam mi rtag pa nyid du rjes su 'jug pa ste /
translated: “The universal is included” refers to the phrase “all” and the expression “mere thing” is included in impermanence.

original: khyad par ston pa na yang ngo //
analyzed: khyad par ston pa na yang ngo //
translated: “Even when a distinction is taught” means that even when a distinction is taught, the universal is included.

original: de bas na sgra mi rtag pa nyid yod pa ma yin na zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam pas yod pa ma yin na'o //
analyzed: de bas na sgra mi rtag pa nyid yod pa ma yin na zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam pas yod pa ma yin na'o //
translated: Therefore, if sound's impermanence does not exist, then impermanence does not exist in the manner explained.

original: rang dang 'gal ba zhes bya ba ni rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang dang 'gal ba zhes bya ba ni rtag pa nyid do //
translated: If it is contrary to itself, then permanence is.

original: gal te sgra mi rtag pa nyid du 'dod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te sgra mi rtag pa nyid du 'dod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If sound were accepted as impermanent,

original: de las bzlog pa gzhan las ma yin pa de'i tshe sgra mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //🔽yod pa yin na ni sel bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gal te sgra mi rtag pa yin par dam bca' bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe sel bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa gzhan las ma yin pa de'i tshe sgra mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro // yod pa yin na ni sel bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gal te sgra mi rtag pa yin par dam bca' bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe sel bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: then it would be expressed in that way, as because sound is impermanent, and not the opposite of that.🔽If it exists, then it would be excluded, that is, if sound were accepted as impermanent, then it would be excluded.

original: gags byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gags byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It would be an obstruction, that is, it would be an obstruction to the thesis that sound is permanent.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshad ma kun las btus pa'i gzung nye bar 'god pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshad ma kun las btus pa'i gzung nye bar 'god pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, etc. is the application of the meaning of the verse to the passage of the Pramānﬁ avārtika.

original: de'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar chos rtag pa dang gtan tshigs yod pa thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba 'di rjod par byed do //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar chos rtag pa dang gtan tshigs yod pa thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba 'di rjod par byed do //
translated: Thus, it is said that the reason is “because all existent things are impermanent.”

original: gal te 'dir gtan tshigs gang gi brjod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'dir gtan tshigs gang gi brjod pa yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, “What is the reason for this?”

original: gtan tshigs kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The expression “the reason also” is stated.

original: ma lus pa brjod pa ni 'jig rten pa yin la /
analyzed: ma lus pa brjod pa ni 'jig rten pa yin la /
translated: The expression of the totality is worldly.

original: brjod par 'dod pa ma lus pa brjod pa ni 'ga' zhig la grags pa yin te /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa ma lus pa brjod pa ni 'ga' zhig la grags pa yin te /
translated: The expression of the totality of what is desired is known to some,

original: skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i dbang gis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i dbang gis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists by the power of the desire of a person.

original: de yang ste sgra @275a * //
analyzed: de yang ste sgra @275a * //
translated: That also, i.e., sound,🔽does not exist as different from all.

original: thams cad las tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad las tha dad pa ste mtshan nyid thams cad de la yang sgra la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad las tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad las tha dad pa ste mtshan nyid thams cad de la yang sgra la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: That which is different from all, i.e., all characteristics, does not exist in that, i.e., in sound.

original: shing sha pa nyid shing ma yin no zhes bya ba ni shing sha pa ma gtogs pa'i shing gzhan zhes bya ba ni ngag gi don min par shes so//
analyzed: shing sha pa nyid shing ma yin no zhes bya ba ni shing sha pa ma gtogs pa'i shing gzhan zhes bya ba ni ngag gi don min par shes so//
translated: The statement “a śimśapā is not a tree” is understood to mean “a tree is not a śimśapā,” and it is understood that a tree other than a śimśapā is not the meaning of the statement.

original: spangs pa ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grub pa'i mtha' smra ba'i'o //
analyzed: spangs pa ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grub pa'i mtha' smra ba'i'o //
translated: The statement “it is not the case that it is not abandoned” is that of the proponent of tenets.

original: sgra la sgra nyid yod pa nyid yin pa zhes bya ba ni sgra nyid ni thams cad nyid ma yin la gal te yod na sgra nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes gzhan dag sems so //
analyzed: sgra la sgra nyid yod pa nyid yin pa zhes bya ba ni sgra nyid ni thams cad nyid ma yin la gal te yod na sgra nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes gzhan dag sems so //
translated: Others think that the statement “sound itself exists as sound” means that sound itself is not all and if it exists, sound itself does not exist.

original: shes par byed pa nyid du ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: shes par byed pa nyid du ma grub pa yin no //
translated: It is not established as that which causes understanding.

original: ci ltar zhe na shes par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na shes par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: How is that? Because it is that which is to be understood.

original: sgra nyid ni gcig nyid yin la de yang zhes bya ba'i che'i nang du 'dus pa yin pas gzhan sgra nyid kyang yod pa ma yin na gang gi shes par byed pa nyid yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: sgra nyid ni gcig nyid yin la de yang zhes bya ba'i che'i nang du 'dus pa yin pas gzhan sgra nyid kyang yod pa ma yin na gang gi shes par byed pa nyid yin par 'gyur /
translated: Sound itself is one and it is included in the word that. Therefore another sound itself does not exist. What causes understanding?

original: shes pa la grub ste zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa la grub ste zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa'i snang ba'o //
translated: “Established in consciousness” means appearing to the conceptual consciousness.

original: de nyid ni ldog pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: de nyid ni ldog pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains just that with “the exclusion of that,” and so on.

original: de rang gi mtshan nyid de dang de las ldog pa ni 'dir ldog pa'i sgras bshad do //
analyzed: de rang gi mtshan nyid de dang de las ldog pa ni 'dir ldog pa'i sgras bshad do //
translated: The exclusion of this from that specific characteristic is explained here with the word “exclusion.”

original: de ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid ldog pa nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas 'ongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa de ni gang la tha snyad kyi rten tha dad par snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid ldog pa nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas 'ongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa de ni gang la tha snyad kyi rten tha dad par snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the conceptual consciousness that has come about through the experience of the exclusion of the specific characteristic will appear as the basis of the different conventions.

original: de mthar phyin pa'i zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de mthar phyin pa'i zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i mthar phyin pa'o //
translated: “The completion of that” is the completion of the different.

original: 'dir ni tha snyad thob pa zhes bya ba ni mdo'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni tha snyad thob pa zhes bya ba ni mdo'i tshig yin no //
translated: Here, “the attainment of the convention” is the words of the sūtra.

original: de la bdun pa'i bsdu ba'am gsum pa'i bsdu ba yin pa de ltar na tha snyad kyis thob pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de la bdun pa'i bsdu ba'am gsum pa'i bsdu ba yin pa de ltar na tha snyad kyis thob pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: There, it is either a seventh case genitive or a third case locative. Thus, he says “the attainment of the convention,” and so on.

original: gang gi tshe 'bras bu'i ngo bo'i tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin par brjod par 'dod pa de'i tshe bdun pa yin la gang gi tshe 'bras bu 'gos par byed pa nyid du brjod par 'dod pa de'i gsum pa'i bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'bras bu'i ngo bo'i tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin par brjod par 'dod pa de'i tshe bdun pa yin la gang gi tshe 'bras bu 'gos par byed pa nyid du brjod par 'dod pa de'i gsum pa'i bsdu ba yin no //
translated: When it is the nature of the effect that is asserted as the probandum, then the seventh case is used. When it is the act of inhering in the effect that is asserted, then the third case is used.

original: blo ni ldog pa'i khyad par la dmigs pa can te dper na sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: blo ni ldog pa'i khyad par la dmigs pa can te dper na sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: The mind is directed to the distinction of the negation, as in the case of “Sound is impermanent because it is produced.”

original: de 'dra ba'i tha dad blo ni 'dres med can te gang gis thob pa med pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i tha dad blo ni 'dres med can te gang gis thob pa med pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Such a different mind is unmixed, and that which does not obtain that is said to be so.

original: sgra rtag ste sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa la chos can nam gtan tshigs ldog pa la brten pa tha dad pa'i blo yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra rtag ste sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa la chos can nam gtan tshigs ldog pa la brten pa tha dad pa'i blo yod pa ma yin no //
translated: When it is said, “Sound is permanent because it is sound,” there is no mind that is different, based on the negation of the subject or the reason.

original: sgra zhes brjod pa na khyad par gzhan mi spong ba'i chos can shes par 'gyur zhing sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bas khyad par gzhan @275b spong ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: sgra zhes brjod pa na khyad par gzhan mi spong ba'i chos can shes par 'gyur zhing sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bas khyad par gzhan @275b spong ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: When the word “sound” is uttered, the subject is understood without excluding other features. And by saying “because of being sound,” is not another feature excluded?

original: gal te de de lta yin na yang shes pa dang sgra gnyi ga la 'jug pa'i yul rnam par gcod pa la mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te de de lta yin na yang shes pa dang sgra gnyi ga la 'jug pa'i yul rnam par gcod pa la mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if that is so, there is no difference because the object that is engaged by both the cognition and the word is the same in being excluded.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bsgrub par bya ba nyid thob pa'i rnam pa las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bsgrub par bya ba nyid thob pa'i rnam pa las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: For that very reason, he says, “from the aspect that obtains the property to be established,” and so on.

original: khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: “The difference is to be established” means the difference of the collection of the eye and so on.

original: 'dus byas pa'i khyad par yang gang du mi rtag pa nyid du gzhan gyis khas ma blangs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dus byas pa'i khyad par yang gang du mi rtag pa nyid du gzhan gyis khas ma blangs pa yin no //
